titles.title: A bill to establish the Grays Harbor National Wildlife Refuge.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

bill.summary: 10/6/1987--Introduced. Directs the Secretary of the Interior to designate and acquire lands for the establishment of the Grays Harbor National Wildlife Refuge, Washington. Requires the Secretary to prepare a management plan which includes a visitor center and other facilities. Authorizes appropriations.
